ehidi madhya wetha adahas dakwu eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye basnahira palath sabha manthri nithignya sisira jayakodi mahatha “kalaniya aasanaye sanwidhayakawaraya lesa ema sanwidhayaka dhuraye randi sitimin balahathkari saha ayatha lesa mudal ekathu karamin eewa thamunge paudgalika prayojanaya sandaha upayogi karaganima saha ema mudal wancha kirima sambandhayen paminilla gonu kala ”yanuwen sandahan kaleya.
